name: Louisisana Janes, Raider of the Tiki Temple
name_original: Louisisana Janes, Raider of the Tiki Temple
description:
Louisisana Janes is a short platformer adventure staring Louisisana Janes (Her name was misspelled on her birth certificate). 

In this adventure Janes journeys through the dark Tiki Temple in the Amazaon Rain-forest (not the Amazon), a small and mostly booby trap free fortress. Her(And therefore your) goal is to collect a crystal at the end of the temple and some golden tikis on the way out then to make it back to where you started to get out of the temple.

Will you help Jones on her adventure or send her falling deep into the earth?
